thread.title: Bumble Bee Chief Executive Taking Leave of Absence

author: Ben DiPietro
title: Bumble Bee Chief Executive Taking Leave of Absence
text:
Bumble Bee Foods Chief Executive Christopher Lischewski is taking a leave of absence to fight charges he colluded to fix tuna prices, the company said Friday.
Jan Tharp, the companyâ€™s chief operating officer, will serve as interim CEO.
Mr. Lischewski was indicted on May 16 in connection with allegedly agreeing to fix prices on packaged seafood... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
